pageProps.title: Learning
pageProps.content:
### 1. Why should I learn?
What is my end goal? Do I really need to learn this? Are there other ways to achieve my goal?
### 2. What should I learn?
What specific topics or skills should I focus on? Am I certain about this?
### 3. How should I learn?
Should I read a related book, find a mentor, or ask a colleague for help?
### 4. How should I practice?
Do I have a safe way to practice and make mistakes?
